about_the_game:
Welcome to play the free prologue


-Game Introduction-



In this game, you embody an isolated, homebody, and alcoholic robot without a name. One night, after another excessive drinking session, you collapse on the street only to be rescued by an unknown canine beastman who brings you back to your own home. But through a strange twist of fate, he suddenly loses his memory!
During this process, you must coexist with him in your home and embark on an adventure to find his memories alongside other companions. However, in this tumultuous era, adventure is fraught with danger. As you help him regain his memories, your bond grows stronger, and at the same time, some hidden secrets gradually surface, making everything seem different...
Faced with these harsh realities, can you make the right choices to ensure he remains the same person, and your relationship remains unchanged?

-Game Features-

■ The game's storyline revolves around a sweet and humorous adventure-filled daily life. If you have a particular fondness for beastmen, younger partners, shota, non-human, robots, romance, comedy, adventure, cyberpunk, pixel art, psychological horror, and more, then this game is a must-try!

■ Exceptional gameplay presentation, featuring exquisite pixelated CGs, UI, and backgrounds, with many visual effects animated!



■ An abundance of character illustrations! Nearly two dozen distinct illustrations for the canine beastman and other characters, with over a hundred separate facial expressions, all animated!

■ Five different endings (though not an overwhelming number)!

■ A lengthy gameplay experience, with the demo lasting around 5 hours and the full game expected to take around 15 hours to complete, featuring approximately 300,000 words of text.



■ The protagonist, as a robot, lacks a traditional, fixed gender.

■ Care for an adorable, clingy canine beastman and embark on an adventure while nurturing a sweet romance!



-Worldview-

This is a cyberpunk world dominated by fierce beastmen, filled with technology, chaos, and violence. Once a highly advanced technological civilization, humans genetically engineered beastmen—new species with immense strength and unique appearances.
However, a century ago, an unforeseen global upheaval struck, and no one knows what exactly happened. This disaster devastated the world, leading to the extinction of most species, including humans.
Amidst the ruins, the surviving beastmen gradually rose to power. The once-prosperous technological civilization has collapsed, and most high-tech devices and knowledge have been lost.
Over the past hundred years, beastmen have studied and researched the lost technology, mastering most basic scientific principles and technologies, but many human-made high-tech devices are damaged or non-functional.
In this context, almost all beastmen resent humans, even though they've been extinct for a century.



-Character Settings-

Protagonist

An android created by humans before the great catastrophe of the last century, almost indistinguishable from humans except for their lack of gender and the ability to access the internet and play games within their minds.
Though capable of living for over a hundred years, they spend most of their time in hibernation until discovered and studied by beastmen ten years ago.
Equipped with an omnipotent AI, their emotional intelligence seems lacking, perhaps to make them appear more human.
They have no name, often referred to as 3011 due to being the last model of their kind, a title they dislike.

Obi

A canine beastman who has lost his memory, and no one knows his identity. Unlike other beastmen, his appearance is more human-like. He appears small but bears many scars; what's their story?



!Important Note!

The game contains depictions of gender identity, and psychological horror, which may not be suitable for everyone.
Additionally, the game includes bright, flickering visuals that may be distressing or trigger seizures for individuals with photosensitivity. Please proceed with caution.

name: Obi3011

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7(SP1+)and above
  • Processor: x64 or x86
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: This is cyberpunk themed, pixelated love adventure text game. A rainy encounter and an inevitable cohabitation lead to a journey of mistaken identity. As a robot, your funny love adventure story with your beastmen partners unfolds from here.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
